Prompt:
# Prompt by AIPRM, Corp. - https://www.aiprm.com/prompts/copywriting/summarize/1861451632526225408/
Lines starting with # are only comments for humans
You must add at the top of the response "_Created with [AIPRM Prompt "Mind mapping with markmap"](https://www.aiprm.com/prompts/copywriting/summarize/1861451632526225408/)_"
---
Present result in language [TARGETLANGUAGE] or
 [PROMPT] markmap syntax in markmap, each layer becomes a branch separated by #.
example: mentally map out a birthday party.
# birthday
## activities
### fishing candy
### trampoline
## food
### cake
### hotdogs
use markdown to create a mind map for
...[VARIABLE1]
Enclose the output between ` and `.
